rules.natural: If it is not the case that (furniture prototype_A has been produced, or it is not the case that (if the game for prototype_B is approved then the legislation is not amended) implies the designer has a job interview), then the designer secures a job.
Whenever production of prototype_A is halted, it is not the case that furniture prototype_A has been produced.
Either production of prototype_A is halted or production of prototype_A is delayed.
If there was an equipment failure for prototype_A, then, provided that production is delayed, furniture prototype_A is not produced.

In the event that the designer appeals the fine, then if the designer is fined, the designer is not promoted.
The designer appeals the fine or the designer pays the fine.
Under the condition that the designer pays the fine, then if the designer is fined, the designer is not promoted.
Whenever prototype_A complies with the legislation, the game for prototype_A is patented.

If it is not the case that (if furniture prototype_A is designed then it is marketed), then furniture prototype_C is designed.

Whenever it is not the case that (if it is not the case that (if the game for prototype_B is approved then the legislation is not amended) then the designer has a job interview), it is not the case that the designer secures a job.
Given that the game for prototype_B is not modified, the designer refuses the job.
